00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_MDC
00038 #include <linux/user_namespace.h>
00039 #ifdef HAVE_UIDGID_HEADER
00040 # include <linux/uidgid.h>
00041 #endif

00049 
00050 static void __mdc_pack_body(struct mdt_body *b, __u32 suppgid)
00051 {
00052         LASSERT (b != NULL);
00053 
00054         b->mbo_suppgid = suppgid;
00055         b->mbo_uid = from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_uid());
00056         b->mbo_gid = from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_gid());
00057         b->mbo_fsuid = from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_fsuid());
00058         b->mbo_fsgid = from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_fsgid());
00059         b->mbo_capability = cfs_curproc_cap_pack();
00060 }
00061 
00062 void mdc_swap_layouts_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00063                            struct md_op_data *op_data)
00064 {
00065         struct mdt_body *b = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill,
00066                                                     &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00067 
00068         __mdc_pack_body(b, op_data->op_suppgids[0]);
00069         b->mbo_fid1 = op_data->op_fid1;
00070         b->mbo_fid2 = op_data->op_fid2;
00071         b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void mdc_pack_body(struct ptlrpc_request *req, const struct lu_fid *fid,
00075                    u64 valid, size_t ea_size, u32 suppgid, u32 flags)
00076 {
00077         struct mdt_body *b = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill,
00078                                                     &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00079         LASSERT(b != NULL);
00080         b->mbo_valid = valid;
00081         b->mbo_eadatasize = ea_size;
00082         b->mbo_flags = flags;
00083         __mdc_pack_body(b, suppgid);
00084         if (fid) {
00085                 b->mbo_fid1 = *fid;
00086                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00103 static void mdc_pack_name(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00104                           const struct req_msg_field *field,
00105                           const char *name, size_t name_len)
00106 {
00107         char *buf;
00108         size_t buf_size;
00109         size_t cpy_len;
00110 
00111         buf = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, field);
00112         buf_size = req_capsule_get_size(&req->rq_pill, field, RCL_CLIENT);
00113 
00114         LASSERT(name != NULL && name_len != 0 &&
00115                 buf != NULL && buf_size == name_len + 1);
00116 
00117         cpy_len = strlcpy(buf, name, buf_size);
00118 
00119         LASSERT(cpy_len == name_len && lu_name_is_valid_2(buf, cpy_len));
00120 }
00121 
00122 void mdc_readdir_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, __u64 pgoff, size_t size,
00123                       const struct lu_fid *fid)
00124 {
00125         struct mdt_body *b = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill,
00126                                                     &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00127         b->mbo_fid1 = *fid;
00128         b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00129         b->mbo_size = pgoff;                   /* !! */
00130         b->mbo_nlink = size;                    /* !! */
00131         __mdc_pack_body(b, -1);
00132         b->mbo_mode = LUDA_FID | LUDA_TYPE;
00133 }
00134 
00135 /* packing of MDS records */
00136 void mdc_create_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00137                      const void *data, size_t datalen, umode_t mode,
00138                      uid_t uid, gid_t gid, cfs_cap_t cap_effective, __u64 rdev)
00139 {
00140         struct mdt_rec_create   *rec;
00141         char                    *tmp;
00142         __u64                    flags;
00143 
00144         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_create));
00145         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00146 
00147 
00148         rec->cr_opcode   = REINT_CREATE;
00149         rec->cr_fsuid    = uid;
00150         rec->cr_fsgid    = gid;
00151         rec->cr_cap      = cap_effective;
00152         rec->cr_fid1     = op_data->op_fid1;
00153         rec->cr_fid2     = op_data->op_fid2;
00154         rec->cr_mode     = mode;
00155         rec->cr_rdev     = rdev;
00156         rec->cr_time     = op_data->op_mod_time;
00157         rec->cr_suppgid1 = op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00158         rec->cr_suppgid2 = op_data->op_suppgids[1];
00159         flags = 0;
00160         if (op_data->op_bias & MDS_CREATE_VOLATILE)
00161                 flags |= MDS_OPEN_VOLATILE;
00162         set_mrc_cr_flags(rec, flags);
00163         rec->cr_bias     = op_data->op_bias;
00164         rec->cr_umask    = current_umask();
00165 
00166         mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, op_data->op_name, op_data->op_namelen);
00167         if (data) {
00168                 tmp = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00169                 memcpy(tmp, data, datalen);
00170         }
00171 }
00172 
00173 static inline __u64 mds_pack_open_flags(__u64 flags)
00174 {
00175         __u64 cr_flags = (flags & (FMODE_READ | FMODE_WRITE |
00176                                    MDS_OPEN_FL_INTERNAL));
00177 
00178         if (flags & O_CREAT)
00179                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_CREAT;
00180         if (flags & O_EXCL)
00181                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_EXCL;
00182         if (flags & O_TRUNC)
00183                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_TRUNC;
00184         if (flags & O_APPEND)
00185                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_APPEND;
00186         if (flags & O_SYNC)
00187                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_SYNC;
00188         if (flags & O_DIRECTORY)
00189                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_DIRECTORY;
00190 #ifdef FMODE_EXEC
00191         if (flags & FMODE_EXEC)
00192                 cr_flags |= MDS_FMODE_EXEC;
00193 #endif
00194         if (cl_is_lov_delay_create(flags))
00195                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_DELAY_CREATE;
00196 
00197         if (flags & O_NONBLOCK)
00198                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_NORESTORE;
00199 
00200         return cr_flags;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /* packing of MDS records */
00204 void mdc_open_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00205                    umode_t mode, __u64 rdev, __u64 flags, const void *lmm,
00206                    size_t lmmlen)
00207 {
00208         struct mdt_rec_create *rec;
00209         char *tmp;
00210         __u64 cr_flags;
00211 
00212         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_create));
00213         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00214 
00215         /* XXX do something about time, uid, gid */
00216         rec->cr_opcode = REINT_OPEN;
00217         rec->cr_fsuid   = from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_fsuid());
00218         rec->cr_fsgid   = from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_fsgid());
00219         rec->cr_cap    = cfs_curproc_cap_pack();
00220         rec->cr_mode   = mode;
00221         cr_flags        = mds_pack_open_flags(flags);
00222         rec->cr_rdev   = rdev;
00223         rec->cr_umask  = current_umask();
00224         if (op_data != NULL) {
00225                 rec->cr_fid1       = op_data->op_fid1;
00226                 rec->cr_fid2       = op_data->op_fid2;
00227                 rec->cr_time       = op_data->op_mod_time;
00228                 rec->cr_suppgid1   = op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00229                 rec->cr_suppgid2   = op_data->op_suppgids[1];
00230                 rec->cr_bias       = op_data->op_bias;
00231                 rec->cr_old_handle = op_data->op_handle;
00232 
00233                 if (op_data->op_name) {
00234                         mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, op_data->op_name,
00235                                       op_data->op_namelen);
00236 
00237                         if (op_data->op_bias & MDS_CREATE_VOLATILE)
00238                                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_VOLATILE;
00239                 }
00240         }
00241 
00242         if (lmm) {
00243                 cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA;
00244                 tmp = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00245                 memcpy(tmp, lmm, lmmlen);
00246         }
00247         set_mrc_cr_flags(rec, cr_flags);
00248 }
00249 
00250 static inline __u64 attr_pack(unsigned int ia_valid) {
00251         __u64 sa_valid = 0;
00252 
00253         if (ia_valid & ATTR_MODE)
00254                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_MODE;
00255         if (ia_valid & ATTR_UID)
00256                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_UID;
00257         if (ia_valid & ATTR_GID)
00258                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_GID;
00259         if (ia_valid & ATTR_SIZE)
00260                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_SIZE;
00261         if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATIME)
00262                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_ATIME;
00263         if (ia_valid & ATTR_MTIME)
00264                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_MTIME;
00265         if (ia_valid & ATTR_CTIME)
00266                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_CTIME;
00267         if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATIME_SET)
00268                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_ATIME_SET;
00269         if (ia_valid & ATTR_MTIME_SET)
00270                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_MTIME_SET;
00271         if (ia_valid & ATTR_FORCE)
00272                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_FORCE;
00273         if (ia_valid & ATTR_ATTR_FLAG)
00274                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_ATTR_FLAG;
00275         if (ia_valid & ATTR_KILL_SUID)
00276                 sa_valid |=  MDS_ATTR_KILL_SUID;
00277         if (ia_valid & ATTR_KILL_SGID)
00278                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_KILL_SGID;
00279         if (ia_valid & ATTR_CTIME_SET)
00280                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_CTIME_SET;
00281         if (ia_valid & ATTR_FROM_OPEN)
00282                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_FROM_OPEN;
00283         if (ia_valid & ATTR_BLOCKS)
00284                 sa_valid |= MDS_ATTR_BLOCKS;
00285         if (ia_valid & MDS_OPEN_OWNEROVERRIDE)
00286                 /* NFSD hack (see bug 5781) */
00287                 sa_valid |= MDS_OPEN_OWNEROVERRIDE;
00288         return sa_valid;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static void mdc_setattr_pack_rec(struct mdt_rec_setattr *rec,
00292                                  struct md_op_data *op_data)
00293 {
00294         rec->sa_opcode  = REINT_SETATTR;
00295         rec->sa_fsuid   = from_kuid(&init_user_ns, current_fsuid());
00296         rec->sa_fsgid   = from_kgid(&init_user_ns, current_fsgid());
00297         rec->sa_cap     = cfs_curproc_cap_pack();
00298         rec->sa_suppgid = -1;
00299 
00300         rec->sa_fid    = op_data->op_fid1;
00301         rec->sa_valid  = attr_pack(op_data->op_attr.ia_valid);
00302         rec->sa_mode   = op_data->op_attr.ia_mode;
00303         rec->sa_uid    = from_kuid(&init_user_ns, op_data->op_attr.ia_uid);
00304         rec->sa_gid    = from_kgid(&init_user_ns, op_data->op_attr.ia_gid);
00305         rec->sa_size   = op_data->op_attr.ia_size;
00306         rec->sa_blocks = op_data->op_attr_blocks;
00307         rec->sa_atime  = LTIME_S(op_data->op_attr.ia_atime);
00308         rec->sa_mtime  = LTIME_S(op_data->op_attr.ia_mtime);
00309         rec->sa_ctime  = LTIME_S(op_data->op_attr.ia_ctime);
00310         rec->sa_attr_flags = op_data->op_attr_flags;
00311         if ((op_data->op_attr.ia_valid & ATTR_GID) &&
00312              in_group_p(op_data->op_attr.ia_gid))
00313                 rec->sa_suppgid =
00314                         from_kgid(&init_user_ns, op_data->op_attr.ia_gid);
00315         else
00316                 rec->sa_suppgid = op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00317 
00318         rec->sa_bias = op_data->op_bias;
00319 }
00320 
00321 static void mdc_ioepoch_pack(struct mdt_ioepoch *epoch,
00322                              struct md_op_data *op_data)
00323 {
00324         epoch->mio_handle = op_data->op_handle;
00325         epoch->mio_unused1 = 0;
00326         epoch->mio_unused2 = 0;
00327         epoch->mio_padding = 0;
00328 }
00329 
00330 void mdc_setattr_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00331                       void *ea, size_t ealen)
00332 {
00333         struct mdt_rec_setattr *rec;
00334         struct lov_user_md *lum = NULL;
00335 
00336         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) ==sizeof(struct mdt_rec_setattr));
00337         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00338         mdc_setattr_pack_rec(rec, op_data);
00339 
00340         if (ealen == 0)
00341                 return;
00342 
00343         lum = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_EADATA);
00344         if (ea == NULL) { /* Remove LOV EA */
00345                 lum->lmm_magic = cpu_to_le32(LOV_USER_MAGIC_V1);
00346                 lum->lmm_stripe_size = 0;
00347                 lum->lmm_stripe_count = 0;
00348                 lum->lmm_stripe_offset = (typeof(lum->lmm_stripe_offset))(-1);
00349         } else {
00350                 memcpy(lum, ea, ealen);
00351         }
00352 }
00353 
00354 void mdc_unlink_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data)
00355 {
00356         struct mdt_rec_unlink *rec;
00357 
00358         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_unlink));
00359         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00360         LASSERT(rec != NULL);
00361 
00362         rec->ul_opcode  = op_data->op_cli_flags & CLI_RM_ENTRY ?
00363                                         REINT_RMENTRY : REINT_UNLINK;
00364         rec->ul_fsuid   = op_data->op_fsuid;
00365         rec->ul_fsgid   = op_data->op_fsgid;
00366         rec->ul_cap     = op_data->op_cap;
00367         rec->ul_mode    = op_data->op_mode;
00368         rec->ul_suppgid1= op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00369         rec->ul_suppgid2= -1;
00370         rec->ul_fid1    = op_data->op_fid1;
00371         rec->ul_fid2    = op_data->op_fid2;
00372         rec->ul_time    = op_data->op_mod_time;
00373         rec->ul_bias    = op_data->op_bias;
00374 
00375         mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, op_data->op_name, op_data->op_namelen);
00376 }
00377 
00378 void mdc_link_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data)
00379 {
00380         struct mdt_rec_link *rec;
00381 
00382         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_link));
00383         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00384         LASSERT (rec != NULL);
00385 
00386         rec->lk_opcode   = REINT_LINK;
00387         rec->lk_fsuid    = op_data->op_fsuid;//current->fsuid;
00388         rec->lk_fsgid    = op_data->op_fsgid;//current->fsgid;
00389         rec->lk_cap      = op_data->op_cap;//current->cap_effective;
00390         rec->lk_suppgid1 = op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00391         rec->lk_suppgid2 = op_data->op_suppgids[1];
00392         rec->lk_fid1     = op_data->op_fid1;
00393         rec->lk_fid2     = op_data->op_fid2;
00394         rec->lk_time     = op_data->op_mod_time;
00395         rec->lk_bias     = op_data->op_bias;
00396 
00397         mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, op_data->op_name, op_data->op_namelen);
00398 }
00399 
00400 static void mdc_intent_close_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req,
00401                                   struct md_op_data *op_data)
00402 {
00403         struct close_data       *data;
00404         struct ldlm_lock        *lock;
00405         enum mds_op_bias         bias = op_data->op_bias;
00406 
00407         if (!(bias & (MDS_HSM_RELEASE | MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP |
00408                       MDS_RENAME_MIGRATE)))
00409                 return;
00410 
00411         data = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA);
00412         LASSERT(data != NULL);
00413 
00414         lock = ldlm_handle2lock(&op_data->op_lease_handle);
00415         if (lock != NULL) {
00416                 data->cd_handle = lock->l_remote_handle;
00417                 LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lock);
00418         }
00419         ldlm_cli_cancel(&op_data->op_lease_handle, LCF_LOCAL);
00420 
00421         data->cd_data_version = op_data->op_data_version;
00422         data->cd_fid = op_data->op_fid2;
00423 }
00424 
00425 void mdc_rename_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data,
00426                      const char *old, size_t oldlen,
00427                      const char *new, size_t newlen)
00428 {
00429         struct mdt_rec_rename *rec;
00430 
00431         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct mdt_rec_reint) == sizeof(struct mdt_rec_rename));
00432         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00433 
00434         /* XXX do something about time, uid, gid */
00435         rec->rn_opcode  = op_data->op_cli_flags & CLI_MIGRATE ?
00436                                         REINT_MIGRATE : REINT_RENAME;
00437         rec->rn_fsuid    = op_data->op_fsuid;
00438         rec->rn_fsgid    = op_data->op_fsgid;
00439         rec->rn_cap      = op_data->op_cap;
00440         rec->rn_suppgid1 = op_data->op_suppgids[0];
00441         rec->rn_suppgid2 = op_data->op_suppgids[1];
00442         rec->rn_fid1     = op_data->op_fid1;
00443         rec->rn_fid2     = op_data->op_fid2;
00444         rec->rn_time     = op_data->op_mod_time;
00445         rec->rn_mode     = op_data->op_mode;
00446         rec->rn_bias     = op_data->op_bias;
00447 
00448         mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, old, oldlen);
00449 
00450         if (new != NULL)
00451                 mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_SYMTGT, new, newlen);
00452 
00453         if (op_data->op_cli_flags & CLI_MIGRATE &&
00454             op_data->op_bias & MDS_RENAME_MIGRATE) {
00455                 struct mdt_ioepoch *epoch;
00456 
00457                 mdc_intent_close_pack(req, op_data);
00458                 epoch = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH);
00459                 mdc_ioepoch_pack(epoch, op_data);
00460         }
00461 }
00462 
00463 void mdc_getattr_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, __u64 valid, __u32 flags,
00464                       struct md_op_data *op_data, size_t ea_size)
00465 {
00466         struct mdt_body *b = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill,
00467                                                     &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00468 
00469         b->mbo_valid = valid;
00470         if (op_data->op_bias & MDS_CHECK_SPLIT)
00471                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCKSPLIT;
00472         if (op_data->op_bias & MDS_CROSS_REF)
00473                 b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLCROSSREF;
00474         b->mbo_eadatasize = ea_size;
00475         b->mbo_flags = flags;
00476         __mdc_pack_body(b, op_data->op_suppgids[0]);
00477 
00478         b->mbo_fid1 = op_data->op_fid1;
00479         b->mbo_fid2 = op_data->op_fid2;
00480         b->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLID;
00481 
00482         if (op_data->op_name != NULL)
00483                 mdc_pack_name(req, &RMF_NAME, op_data->op_name,
00484                               op_data->op_namelen);
00485 }
00486 
00487 void mdc_close_pack(struct ptlrpc_request *req, struct md_op_data *op_data)
00488 {
00489         struct mdt_ioepoch *epoch;
00490         struct mdt_rec_setattr *rec;
00491 
00492         epoch = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MDT_EPOCH);
00493         rec = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_REC_REINT);
00494 
00495         mdc_setattr_pack_rec(rec, op_data);
00496         /*
00497          * The client will zero out local timestamps when losing the IBITS lock
00498          * so any new RPC timestamps will update the client inode's timestamps.
00499          * There was a defect on the server side which allowed the atime to be
00500          * overwritten by a zeroed-out atime packed into the close RPC.
00501          *
00502          * Proactively clear the MDS_ATTR_ATIME flag in the RPC in this case
00503          * to avoid zeroing the atime on old unpatched servers.  See LU-8041.
00504          */
00505         if (rec->sa_atime == 0)
00506                 rec->sa_valid &= ~MDS_ATTR_ATIME;
00507 
00508         mdc_ioepoch_pack(epoch, op_data);
00509         mdc_intent_close_pack(req, op_data);
00510 }
